name: IDG.se – Centered without ads [Read Description]
description: This is just a basic style to center the whole page and removes them annoying ads. Now also supports all the sister domains.   They updated their design, so this fix is no longer useful!   =================== Be sure to check out my other userstyles! http://userstyles.org/users/92431

user.name: Crystallis
